list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of people or animals engaged in a task or activity for a fixed period of time and then replaced by a similar group.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the wagons were pulled by relays of horses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các toa xe được kéo bởi rơle của ngựa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an electrical device, typically incorporating an electromagnet, which is activated by a current or signal in one circuit to open or close another circuit.
a device to receive, reinforce, and retransmit a broadcast or program.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy phát TV và trạm chuyển tiếp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: receive and pass on (information or a message).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she intended to relay everything she had learned
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy dự định chuyển tiếp mọi thứ cô ấy đã học

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they plan to relay about half a mile of the track
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ có kế hoạch chuyển tiếp khoảng nửa dặm của đường đua
